Title


Description


Categories


Date






Travel Guide Chatbot


Build a travel guide chatbot using two approaches: 1. Custom Solution: Manually chain LLMs, fine-tuned models, and tool-calling for a tailored experience. 2. Modern Framework: Leverage LangChain for streamlined tool-calling and scalability. 


Python, Langchain, Ollama, unsloth, finetune, LoRa, streamlit


Dec 13, 2024




Crisisfacts [Information Retrieval]


A submission for CrisisFACTS: an open data challenge for state-of-the-art temporal summarization technologies to support disaster-response managers’ use of online data sources during crisis events. Implemented a backend database with mongodb, self-made python package to process data, and a frontend for better user experience. 


Python, Docker, React js, MongoDB, Flask API, Information Retrieval


Oct 1, 2024




Reddit Analysis[AWS Sagemaker]


A project analyzing Reddit data and external sources like “Dear Abby” newspaper columns to explore patterns in how people seek advice and the responses they receive, uncovering insights into advice-seeking behavior and interpersonal reactions. 


Python, AWS, Sagemaker, SparkNLP, RandomForest


Aug 12, 2024




Neural Network from Scratch


Build a simple neural network entirely from scratch to develop a clear and detailed understanding of how backpropagation works. By implementing the process step by step, you’ll gain insights into the underlying mechanics of gradient computation, weight updates, and how the network learns from data. 


Python, DeepLearning, numpy


May 12, 2024




Toxic Comment Classification


Developed a model to classify toxic comments from social media platforms using an LSTM-based neural network implemented with Keras, leveraging deep learning to analyze and detect harmful content. 


Python, DeepLearning, Keras, LSTM


Jan 1, 2024





No matching items

title: JaeHo Bahng
text:
Tractor Supply Company | Data Analyst | May 2024 - Present
LG Fashion | Data Analyst | January 2019 - May 2023
Korean Army | Korean/English Translator | April 2013 - January 2015

title: JaeHo Bahng
text:
About Me

Led projects in pricing strategy, inventory management, sales optimization, customer retention, and P&L analysis, leveraging SQL, Power BI, and Tableau for impactful insights and decision-making.
Expertise in predictive modeling, A/B testing, deep learning, LLM fine-tuning, web scraping custom Python packages, and model deployment implementing CI/CD pipelines.

How I got here Growing up as a third-culture kid, I moved every 2–3 years, living in Hong Kong, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, China, and Bangladesh. Attending international schools shaped my bilingual proficiency in English and Korean and taught me to embrace diversity with a global perspective. After 14 years abroad, I returned to Korea, earning a degree in economics from Sogang University. I then worked as a data analyst at an online fashion retail platform for four years. Currently, I’m pursuing a master’s in Data Science and Analytics at Georgetown University while working as a data analyst at Tractor Supply Company.
